task.title: Configure Edge Network Mode
task.shortdesc: This section provides detailed configuration instructions for Edge network mode. requires network connectivity between its clients (end-users) and the cloud components (CC, CLC, and Walrus).

taskbody.context:
To configure for Edge mode, most networking configuration is handled through settings in a global Cloud Controller (CLC) property file.
